name: Chicken Wants to Cross the River
name_original: Chicken Wants to Cross the River
description:
One day, a chicken wanted to cross a river. Help it choose the right choice so it can cross the river.

Features

  • Original pixel graphics
  • Narrative events
  • Narrative game over
  • Trap choices
  • Humor events
  • Unexpected events
  • Sequence of pages to simulate animation

How to play

  • Choose a correct choice to proceed
  • Wrong choice may lead to game over

Requirement

  • A PDF reader (Recommended: Foxit Reader)

Changelog

  • v1.0.2 (April 14th, 2016, GMT)
    • Replaced name since I used different one before.
    • Changed version position.
    • Added special page just in case if hyperlink goes to wrong page.
    • Added more info for document properties.
    • Changed some links.
    • Change title logo
  • v1.0.1 (September 4th, 2014, GMT)
    • Revised the game title (just forgot the "s" on "want")
  • v1 (September 4th, 2014, GMT)
    • Game is released.
